description:
A highly influential businessman and leader. Prior to the events of the series he had great influence among politicians and won them over to further establish control among governments. With his massive wealth he was able to further his goal of world domination but most importantly to get insight into the greater creation of the three realms and how to control them. 
Aside from this he was seen as a genius among men and hosted exclusive parties for the rich where they would partake in orgies. [spoiler="."]Behind closed doors he was a murderous sociopath who often assaulted and tortured his victims.[/spoiler]
name: Caesar
